      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ae5a0234-3b01-467f-8217-8342ce9347fe#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A szén körforgása a természetben</string>
            <string language="en">Carbon's circulation in nature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zirkulation des Carbons in der Natur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La circulation du carbone en nature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circulação do carbono na natureza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circolazione del carbonio in natura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλοφορία άνθρακα στη φύση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circulación del carbón en naturaleza</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szén körforgását szemléltető rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing demonstrating carbon's circulation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">anyagforgalom,  szén körforgása,  termelő,  fogyasztó,  lebontó,  ökoszisztéma,  </string>
            <string language="en">trade in materials, carbon's circulation, grower, consumer, decomposer, ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen, Zirkulation des Carbons demonstrierend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessin démontrant la circulation du carbone</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhar demonstrando a circulação do carbono</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipare dimostrando circolazione del carbonio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός της καταδεικνύοντας κυκλοφορίας του άνθρακα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El trazar demostrando la circulación del carbón</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">handeln Sie in den Materialien, Zirkulation des Carbons,
Züchter, Verbraucher, decomposer, Oekosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commercez en matériaux, la circulation du carbone, 
cultivateur, consommateur, decomposer, écosystème</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">negocíe nos materiais, circulação do carbono, grower,
consumidor, decomposer, ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">commerci in materiali, la circolazione del carbonio, il
coltivatore, il consumatore, il decomposer, ecosistema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εμπόριο στα υλικά, κυκλοφορία του άνθρακα, καλλιεργητής, 
καταναλωτής, decomposer, οικοσύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">negocie en los materiales, circulación del carbón, 
cultivador, consumidor, decomposer, ecosistema</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
